com.opengamma.strata.calc.runner.function

Interface CurrencyConvertible<R>

  • Type Parameters:
    R - the type of the currency converted result
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CurrencyValuesArray, DefaultScenarioResult, MultiCurrencyValuesArray, SingleScenarioResult

    public interface CurrencyConvertible<R>
    Provides the ability for objects to be automatically currency converted.

    The interface is intended to operate with multi-scenario objects. As such, the supplied market data is scenario aware, and the FX rate used to convert each value may be different.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      R convertedTo(Currency reportingCurrency, CalculationMarketData marketData)
      Returns a copy of this object with any currency amounts converted into the reporting currency.

    • Method Detail

      • convertedTo

        R convertedTo(Currency reportingCurrency,
              CalculationMarketData marketData)
        Returns a copy of this object with any currency amounts converted into the reporting currency.

        Each currency amount in the object will be converted to the specified currency. Any object that is not a currency amount will be left unchanged.

        The supplied market data is scenario aware. If this object is also scenario aware, then the FX rate used to convert each value may be different. In that case, the market data must have the same number of scenarios as this instance.

        Parameters:
        reportingCurrency - the currency into which all currency amounts should be converted
        marketData - the multi-scenario market data containing any FX rates needed to perform the conversion
        Returns:
        a copy of this result with any currency amounts converted into the reporting currency
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if no FX rate could be found
